original_text: Because he hath despised the word of the Lord, and hath broken his commandment, that soul shall utterly be cut off; his iniquity shall be upon him.
korean_text: 그런 사람은 여호와의 말씀을 멸시하고 그의 명령을 파괴하였은즉 그의 죄악이 자기에게로 돌아가서 온전히 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: Because he hath despised the word of the Lord
that soul shall utterly be cut off
his iniquity shall be upon him
